The genitals of male and female 
newborn babies may appear

Jaundice
When they are about three 
days old, many babies 
develop mild jaundice. This 
will make their skin and the 
whites of their eyes look a 
bit yellow. This usually fades 
within 10 days or so. If you 
are concerned about your
